\subsection{\textcolor{Chapter }{Core (for IsPoset)}}
\logpage{[ 2, 1, 7 ]}\nobreak
\hyperdef{L}{X7CF10B977AE69D49}{}
{\noindent\textcolor{FuncColor}{$\triangleright$\enspace\texttt{Core({\mdseries\slshape X})\index{Core@\texttt{Core}!for IsPoset}
\label{Core:for IsPoset}
}\hfill{\scriptsize (operation)}}\\
\textbf{\indent Returns:\ }
a core of X 



 the natural maps are the inclusion i: core(X) --{\textgreater} X and the
retraction r: X --{\textgreater} core(X) }
